pr_title: Save memory when histogram agg is not on top

timeline.message:
Save memory when histogram agg is not on top

This saves some memory when the `histogram` aggregation is not a top
level aggregation by dropping `asMultiBucketAggregator` in favor of
natively implementing multi-bucket storage in the aggregator. For the
most part this just uses the `LongKeyedBucketOrds` that we built the
first time we did this.

timeline.bodyText: There was a TODO that the range and numeric version of the aggregator shared a ton of code. Now they share a superclass that provides all that code.
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: I moved this check into the ctor so I can use the ctor reference that we've been doing elsewhere.
